original: Larsson, Alvar Erik Arvid, fil. lic.. Valdemarsvik, f. 4/9/12 i Torsåker, Gävleb. 1., av Arvid o. Anna L. G. 41 m. Anna Lisa Berg. — Fil. kand. v. Sthlms högsk. 40, fil. lic. 43. Anst. v. Veterinärliögskolans med. klin. 38-41, as’sist. v. Cellulosaind. centrallab. 41-44, dito v. Sv. träfors^kn :inst. 44-45, kemist v. C. J. Lundbergs Läderfabr. A-B i Valdemarsvik sed. 45. Medl. av Kemistsamf. o. Odd Fellow. Skr.: div. art. i fackpressen.
translated: Larsson, Alvar Erik Arvid, M.A. Valdemarsvik, b. 4/9/12 in Torsåker, Gävleb. County, the eldest son of Arvid and Anna L. G. Larsson. Married Anna Lisa Berg in 1941. - Bachelor of Arts from Stockholm University in 1940, Master of Arts in 1943. Employed at the Veterinary School's Medical Clinic from 1938-1941, assistant at the Central Laboratory of the Cellulose Industry from 1941-1944, assistant at the Swedish Wood Research Institute from 1944-1945, chemist at C.J. Lundbergs Leather Factory AB in Valdemarsvik since 1945. Member of the Chemical Society and the Odd Fellow Society. Authored various articles in professional journals.

organization.name: Central Laboratory of the Cellulose Industry
